questions.question_text: An organization is planning an acquisition and has engaged an IS auditor to evaluate the IT governance framework of the target company. Which of the following would be MOST helpful in determining the effectiveness of the framework?

choices.C: IT performance benchmarking reports with competitors
choices.D: Self-assessment reports of IT capability and maturity
choices.B: Current and previous internal IS audit reports

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B provides objective, detailed evidence of internal processes, controls, risk management practices, and compliance with organizational and industry policies, which are crucial for a thorough evaluation.

Selected Answer: A
A is the correct answer
A is the correct answear due to the fact that reports from third parties are independent and objective than the one s made by the internal auditors

questions.question_text: Which of the following is an executive management concern that could be addressed by the implementation of a security metrics dashboard?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Executives are focused on security program execution and effectiveness, and a security metrics dashboard provides visibility into the implementation and effectiveness of security measures.

choices.C: Execute copies of EUC programs out of a secure library.
choices.A: Have an independent party review the source calculations.
choices.B: Verify EUC results through manual calculations.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Having an independent party review the source calculations provides an additional layer of validation and assurance. This helps ensure the accuracy and integrity of the calculations by having someone separate from the original creator verify the logic, formulas, and assumptions used in the calculations. Independent reviews can help identify errors, inconsistencies, or potential risks in the calculations, reducing the likelihood of unintended modifications causing issues. Overall, independent review adds accountability and improves the quality of the calculations in end-user computing environments.

Selected Answer: C
C. Execute copies of EUC programs out of a secure library.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.

comments.content:
Having an independent party review the source calculations is a crucial control measure to ensure accuracy and reliability. Independent review can help identify errors, omissions, or unintended modifications made by the original creator of the EUC. It provides an objective assessment and can help catch mistakes that may not be apparent to the creator.

In summary, while all these measures may contribute to risk mitigation, having an independent party review the source calculations is the most effective way to reduce the risk of unintentional modifications in complex calculations in end-user computing.

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the BEST way to mitigate the risk associated with unintentional modifications of complex calculations in end-user computing (EUC)?

choices.B: A heat map with the gaps and recommendations displayed in terms of risk
choices.D: Available resources for the activities included in the action plan
choices.C: Supporting evidence for the gaps and recommendations mentioned in the audit report
choices.A: A management response in the final report with a committed implementation date

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. A management response in the final report with a committed implementation date

comments.content:
While having available resources for the activities included in the action plan (option D) is important for executing follow-up activities, it is secondary to ensuring a management response with a committed implementation date. Without a clear commitment and timeline from management, follow-up activities lack the necessary direction and accountability needed to verify the resolution of audit findings.

Therefore, option A is the critical requirement that must be in place before an IS auditor initiates audit follow-up activitiesâ€”to have a management response in the final report with a committed implementation date.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Having a management response in the final report with a committed implementation date is crucial before initiating audit follow-up activities. This response indicates that the management has acknowledged the audit findings and committed to addressing them within a specified timeframe. It provides a clear plan of action for resolving the identified issues and ensures accountability. While supporting evidence for the gaps and recommendations mentioned in the audit report (option C) is also important for validating the findings, the commitment from management with a specific timeline for implementation is a foundational requirement for effective follow-up activities.

questions.question_text: Which of the following must be in place before an IS auditor initiates audit follow-up activities?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. Determine where delays have occurred.

Before taking any action to address the delay in the audit project, it is important for the audit manager to determine the cause of the delay. This will help the audit manager to identify the root cause and make informed decisions on how to address the situation. Understanding where the delays have occurred will help the audit manager to better allocate resources and make changes to the project plan to ensure that the audit is completed on time. Only after the cause of the delay has been determined can the audit manager consider options such as extending the deadline, assigning additional resources, or escalating to the audit committee.

Selected Answer: D
D. The manager needs to determine the reason of the delay before taking action.

Selected Answer: D
